name: Chicken Vegetable Noodle Soup
author: Lois and Lynna Drury

ingredients.name: bags of Kluski or homemade noodles

instructions: In a large stew pot, place hen, spices, tomato juice and puree. Add water to pot a little over half full. Cook chicken until done. Re- move and debone. Place celery pieces, carrots, onions and cabbage in bubbling broth. Cook until done. Remove vegetables to a warm plat- ter. Drop noodles in broth and cook until done. Serve noodle soup in soup bowls and add vegetables and chicken on top or serve them as a side dish.
